keyword: how many calories in a waffle
title: How Many Calories in a Waffle?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a waffle, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Waffle?
assumptions: Standard frozen waffle (e.g., 75 g, plain, toasted without toppings); values based on average commercial brand like Eggo.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard waffle has about 210 kcal, with 30 g carbs and 4 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp butter and 2 tbsp maple syrup

faqs.q: How many calories in a plain waffle?
faqs.a: About 210 kcal for a standard 75 g frozen waffle, toasted.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a waffle?
faqs.a: Roughly 30 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 8 g sugars per waffle.
No, typically 4 g protein per waffle; pair with toppings like yogurt for more.

faqs.q: How does waffle size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger waffles (e.g., Belgian) can have 250+ kcal; smaller ones around 150 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in a waffle?
faqs.a: About 8 g total fat, with 1.5 g saturated fat per standard waffle.
